system.description: The character irritates a foe with their sharp wit
system.trigger: The character succeeds in an attack on an enemy in earshot, or an enemy in earshot fails an attack on them.
system.effect: The character cracks a joke at the enemy's expense. Make an Ego attack, On a success, It does regular Focus damage, On a Fantastic success, the damage is doubled and the target is stunned for one round
